kpi.name: M1002C511

kpi_info.title: DCH ALLO FOR SIG LINK FROM HSPA TO HSPA LAYER
kpi_info.use: The number of DCH allocations for signaling link from HSPA layer to HSPA layer due to Directed RRC Connection Setup for HSPA layer. When a UE is directed from one HSPA layer to another HSPA layer during Directed RRC Connection Setup procedure.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH ALLO FOR SIG LINK FROM HSPA TO HSPA LAYER
